structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Denaturing And Marking Of Broken Eggs In Cold Storage
law.text: Broken eggs packed in cans, if not intended for food, shall be denatured when deposited in cold storage, and shall be marked by the owner, in accordance with forms prescribed by the department of public health, so as plainly to indicate that they are not to be sold for food.
